channel.title: Ok, adding global objects wall help
channel.description: ok... i was using the code makeglobalobject blah blah blah only some of the walls work.. and none of them are what i need! what do i do? which wall should i use?

item.title: Ok, adding global objects wall help
item.dc:creator: @andrisovas andrisovas
item.description:
@andrisovas wrote:

Howdy need help …? Here it is … il hope that i get a rep

go client.java and search for :

Code:

makeglobalobject

then to add the object u should add somethin like this

Code:

       makeGlobalObject(x, y, id, 0, 10);

in x do the x coords,
in y do the y coords,
and in id do the object id,

Read full topic
item.source: Ok, adding global objects wall help
